note.title: Protocol (POP3 or IMAP) of the mail server
note.p: If the system property mail.store.protocol is set then this argument is not required.
If the value is pop3, then the following mail.pop3.* arguments are to be used for the connection to the mail server.
If the value is imap, then the following mail.imap.* arguments are to be used for the connection to the mail server.
